answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.I am sorry to read about your cousin.  Unfortunatley, there is not a lot that can be done without her seeing a doctor.  I think that you should work on convincing her to go.  Are there other family members that can help you talk with her?  IF she continues to refuse, your hands are tied.  She will only do what she wants to do.  Has she expressed why she won't go to the doctor?  I am sorry that I cannot be of more help.  Good luck.Bridget
